tool.name: IMCORR - Feature Tracking
tool.description: The tool performs an image correlation based on two raster data sets. Additionally, two DTMs can be given and used to optain 3D displacement vectors.<br/>This is a SAGA implementation of the standalone IMCORR software provided by the National Snow and Ice Data Center in Boulder, Colorado / US.

param.name: DTM_1
param.label: DTM 1
param.help: The first DTM used to assign height information to grid 1

param.name: DTM_2
param.label: DTM 2
param.help: The second DTM used to assign height information to grid 2

param.name: SEARCH_CHIPSIZE
param.label: Search Chip Size (Cells)
param.help: Chip size of search chip, used to find correlating reference chip

param.name: REF_CHIPSIZE
param.label: Reference Chip Size (Cells)
param.help: Chip size of reference chip to be found in search chip

param.name: GRID_SPACING
param.label: Grid Spacing (Map Units)
param.help: Grid spacing used for the construction of correlated points [map units]
